COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS
April 10, 1967
Mr. William R. Boehle, Chairman
Department of Music
The University of North Dakota
Grand Forks, North Dakota 58201
Dear Mr. Boehle:
Thank you very much for your letter of April 4
with further reference to the Public Television Act of
1967.
Mr. Boehle, I appreciated hearing from you and
having your further thoughts on this legislation including
amending the title of the bill to include broadcasting.
Your views are most helpful to me, and I assure you they
will be given every consideration when this legislation
is before the Senate.
With kindest personal regards,
MRYrsv
MILTON R. YOUNG
